Taiwan

Street Food Heaven

Country Background

Apart from the famous night markets that you've probably already heard of, Taiwan is also known for its rich culture and beautiful coasts and mountains.

People

Taiwanese people are extremely passionate and helpful and wouldn't hesitate to strike up a conversation with you.

Culture

Taiwan is a great place to visit for people with all forms of interests, be it hiking, performances, museums - there's a place for everyone.

Food

Taiwan has AMAZING food not limited to its streetfood - be sure to do your research and mark the few 老字号 (traditional) restaurants that both locals and tourists will frequent.
